certifications.title: AZ-205 : Applied Algorithms and Data Structures

projects.name: Online Educational Platform
projects.description: Developed a web platform to assist students in structuring their learning journey with curated resources and guidance. Utilized React.js to build a responsive and intuitive user interface, enhancing the user experience and engagement. Implemented the backend using Express.js and connected to a PostgreSQL database for efficient data management and retrieval.

projects.name: Intelligent Recipe Suggester
projects.description: An Image detection or Image processing based project that will suggest recipe by detecting the vegetable. The model had been created and tested with Google Colab and Tensorflow. Developed the model to ease the work of the people by wasting the time on thinking about the recipe and make them to have a healthy food.

experiences.description: Designed a real-time dashboard using Figma to notify managers about stock levels and employee tasks in a supermarket, enhancing operational efficiency. Integrated Autonomous Ground Vehicle (AGV) for rack scanning and product availability checks, automating notifications for restocking needs. Enabled managers to assign and manage employee tasks for product replacement and rearrangement through the dashboard, improving task delegation and communication.

full_output.name: Vasantha Ruban N
achievements_and_awards: Achieved Global Rank 58 in December Long 2022 contest at CodeChef, showcasing advanced coding skills
